mapper.select:
SELECT seq, pc_hostname, pc_uuid FROM tbl_pc_mangr
org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )

SELECT a.seq, to_char(a.login_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as login_dt, to_char(a.logout_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as logout_dt, EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(a.logout_dt, a.login_dt)) * interval '1 sec' as spent_time, (select UPPER(pc_hostname) from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = a.uuid) as pc_hostname, a.uuid as pc_uuid, b.org_seq, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq = (select org_seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = a.uuid))as org_nm, last_value (a.seq) over(partition by a.uuid order by a.seq ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) as last_seq FROM tbl_loginout a left outer join tbl_pc_mangr b on a.uuid = b.pc_uuid
1=1
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{auditLogVo.org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and a.login_dt >= #{auditLogVo.date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and a.login_dt <= #{auditLogVo.date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and (select UPPER(pc_hostname) from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = a.uuid) like '%' || UPPER(#{auditLogVo.txtSearch}) || '%'
order by login_dt desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}

SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt FROM tbl_loginout a left outer join tbl_pc_mangr b on a.uuid = b.pc_uuid
1=1
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and a.login_dt >= #{date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and a.login_dt <= #{date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and (select UPPER(pc_hostname) from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = a.uuid) like '%' || UPPER(#{txtSearch}) || '%'

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS rownum, b.user_sabun, case when b.rank = '002' then '사원' when b.rank = '003' then '대리' when b.rank = '004' then '과장' when b.rank = '100' then '관리자' else '부장' end as rank, b.user_name, b.user_id, to_char(a.login_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as login_dt, to_char(a.logout_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as logout_dt, to_char(age(a.logout_dt,a.login_dt),'HH24:MI:SS') as spent_time, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq = (select org_seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = a.uuid))as org_nm, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq=b.org_seq) as join_org_nm FROM tbl_loginout a left outer join tbl_user b on a.seq = b.seq
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and to_char(login_dt,'yyyymmdd') >= #{date_fr}
and to_char(login_dt,'yyyymmdd') <= #{date_to}
and b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and (b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%' or b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%')

SELECT a.user_id,a.pc_ip,a.cnnc_url,a.pc_uuid,a.hostname, case when a.state = 'start' then '브라우저시작' when a.state = 'stop' then '브라우저종료' when a.state = 'connect' then '인터넷접속' when a.state = 'Illegal' then '유해사이트접속' else '' end as state, to_char(a.reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') as reg_dt, to_char(a.insert_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as insert_dt, b.user_name,b.org_seq, case when b.rank = '002' then '사원' when b.rank = '003' then '대리' when b.rank = '004' then '과장' when b.rank = '100' then '관리자' else '부장' end as rank FROM (select * from tbl_inet_log order by reg_dt desc) a join tbl_user b on a.user_id = b.user_id
1=1
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{auditLogVo.org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and to_char(reg_dt,'yyyymmdd') >= #{auditLogVo.date_fr}
and to_char(reg_dt,'yyyymmdd') <= #{auditLogVo.date_to}
and b.user_name like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%'
and (b.user_name like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%' or b.user_id like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%')
and a.state = 'connect'
and a.state = 'Illegal'
and b.user_name like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch1} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch2} || '%'
and a.hostname = #{auditLogVo.txtSearch3}
and a.cnnc_url like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch4} || '%'
and b.rank = #{auditLogVo.txtSearch5}
and cnnc_url != '-c'
order by a.reg_dt desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}

SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt FROM tbl_inet_log a join tbl_user b on a.user_id = b.user_id
1=1
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and to_char(reg_dt,'yyyymmdd') >= #{date_fr}
and to_char(reg_dt,'yyyymmdd') <= #{date_to}
and b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and (b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%' or b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%')
and a.state = 'connect'
and a.state = 'Illegal'
and b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch1} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch2} || '%'
and a.hostname = #{txtSearch3}
and a.cnnc_url like '%' || #{txtSearch4} || '%'
and b.rank = #{txtSearch5}
and cnnc_url != '-c'

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS rownum, a.pc_ip,a.cnnc_url,a.pc_uuid,a.hostname, case when a.state = 'start' then '브라우저시작' when a.state = 'stop' then '브라우저종료' when a.state = 'connect' then '인터넷접속' when a.state = 'Illegal' then '유해사이트접속' else '' end as state, to_char(a.reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') as reg_dt, to_char(a.insert_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as insert_dt, b.user_id, b.user_name, case when b.rank = '002' then '사원' when b.rank = '003' then '대리' when b.rank = '004' then '과장' when b.rank = '100' then '관리자' else '부장' end as rank, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq=b.org_seq) as org_nm FROM tbl_inet_log a join tbl_user b on a.user_id = b.user_id
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and to_char(reg_dt,'yyyymmdd') >= #{date_fr}
and to_char(reg_dt,'yyyymmdd') <= #{date_to}
and b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and (b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%' or b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%')
and a.state = 'connect'
and a.state = 'Illegal'
and b.user_name like '%' || #{txtSearch1} || '%'
and b.user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch2} || '%'
and a.hostname = #{txtSearch3}
and a.cnnc_url like '%' || #{txtSearch4} || '%'
and b.rank = #{txtSearch5}
and cnnc_url != '-c'

SELECT pc_cpu, pc_memory, pc_disk, pc_macaddress, pc_ip, pc_hostname, pc_disk_id, pc_cpu_id, pc_uuid, to_char(insert_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as insert_dt from tbl_pc_change_info
org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{auditLogVo.org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and insert_dt >= #{auditLogVo.date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and insert_dt <= #{auditLogVo.date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and pc_hostname like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%'
order by insert_dt desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}

SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt FROM tbl_pc_change_info
org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and insert_dt >= #{date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and insert_dt <= #{date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and pc_hostname like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'

SELECT tu.pc_uuid, tu.vendor, tu.product, tu.info, tpm.pc_hostname, tu.insert_dt from tbl_unauthroized tu left join tbl_pc_mangr tpm on tpm.pc_uuid = tu.pc_uuid
tu.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{auditLogVo.org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and tu.insert_dt >= #{auditLogVo.date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and tu.insert_dt <= #{auditLogVo.date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and tpm.pc_hostname like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%'
order by tu.insert_dt desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}

SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt from tbl_unauthroized tu left join tbl_pc_mangr tpm on tpm.pc_uuid = tu.pc_uuid
tu.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and tu.insert_dt >= #{date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and tu.insert_dt <= #{date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and tpm.pc_hostname like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS rownum, a.uuid,a.vendor,a.product,a.info, a.pc_user,a.insert_dt, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq=b.org_seq) as org_nm FROM tbl_unauthroized a join tbl_user b on a.pc_user = b.user_id
and b.org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )

SELECT HOSTNAME, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq = org_seq)as ORG_NM, PRCSSNAME, ipaddress, (select pc_ip from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = uuid)as pc_ip, INSERT_DT, ORG_SEQ FROM TBL_PRCSS_BLOCK_LOG
1=1
and org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{auditLogVo.org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and insert_dt >= #{auditLogVo.date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and insert_dt <= #{auditLogVo.date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and HOSTNAME like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%'
and PRCSSNAME like '%' || #{auditLogVo.txtSearch} || '%'
order by insert_dt desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}

SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt FROM TBL_PRCSS_BLOCK_LOG
1=1
and org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and insert_dt >= #{date_fr}::TIMESTAMP
and insert_dt <= #{date_to}::TIMESTAMP
and HOSTNAME like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and PRCSSNAME like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS rownum, HOSTNAME, (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq = org_seq)as ORG_NM, PRCSSNAME, ipaddress, macaddress, INSERT_DT, USER_ID, ORG_SEQ FROM TBL_PRCSS_BLOCK_LOG
and org_seq in ( with recursive search_org(seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} union all select a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,level+1,path || a.seq,a.seq=any(path) from tbl_org a, search_org so where a.p_seq = so.seq and not cycle) select seq from search_org )
and to_date(insert_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd') >= #{date_fr}::date
and to_date(insert_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd') <= #{date_to}::date
and (select org_nm from tbl_org where seq = org_seq) = #{txtSearch}
and user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%'
and ((select org_nm from tbl_org where seq = org_seq) like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%' or user_id like '%' || #{txtSearch} || '%')
SELECT PU_NAME FROM TBL_PROGRM_UDPT

select.foreach:
( select * from tbl_updt_policy_action_result tb1 ,tbl_progrm_udpt tb2 where tb1.debname = tb2.pu_name and tb1.pc_uuid = #{uuid} and tb1.debname = #{item} order by tb1.insert_dt desc limit 1 )
UNION ALL

mapper.select: select pu_name as pcm_name from tbl_progrm_udpt where pu_seq in ( select unnest(string_to_array(ppm_seq, ','))::int from tbl_progrm_applc where org_seq = (select org_seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{pc_uuid}))

select.foreach:
( select * from tbl_act_progrm_log tb1, tbl_progrm_udpt tb2 where tb1.progrmname = tb2.pu_name and tb1.uuid = #{uuid} and tb1.progrmname = #{item} order by tb1.ins_date desc limit 1 )
UNION ALL

mapper.select: SELECT sm_port FROM tbl_security_mngr where sm_gubun='P'

select.foreach:
(select * from tbl_act_firewall_log tb1 ,tbl_security_mngr tb2 where tb1.retport = tb2.sm_port and tb1.uuid = #{uuid} and tb1.retport = #{item} order by tb1.ins_date desc limit 1)
UNION ALL

mapper.select: SELECT distinct product FROM tbl_act_device_log WHERE org_seq in ( select org_seq from tbl_pc_mangr tpm where uuid = #{uuid} )
(select * from tbl_act_nxss_log tb1 where tb1.uuid = #{uuid} order by tb1.ins_date desc limit 2)
